issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
We have imported a already existing project. That has no build folder.
The project type is alloy

When we run the project we get following error message
[ERROR] :  ** BUILD FAILED **
[ERROR] :  The following build commands failed:
[ERROR] : Ld build/ Debug-iphonesimulator/ Exam.app/ Exam normal i386
[ERROR] :  (1 failure)
fields.environment:
Mac OS Version	10.9
Xcode Version	5.0.1 (5A2053)
IOS Simulator Version	IOS 7
Titanium Studio	build: 3.1.3

comments.body:
Hello Sivaram,

We have been unable to reproduce the issue you are seeing. As an alternative to importing you can try to copy the project files to a new project. To do this, could you please do the following:
1. Create a new project
2. Copy all project files, except for the tiapp.xml, from your existing project (that you tried to import) into this new project, overwriting when necessary (You may need to re-add in any modules that your app requires)
3. Try to build and run the new project

If the build continues to fail, please send us any output or log files from your app's session.
Marking this as "Cannot reproduce". Please comment if you need further help on this. If we don't hear back, we will close it permanently in a week.
